values.value: SELECT Id,Recalculate_Quote__c, SBQQ__LastCalculatedOn__c,LastModifiedDate, (select id from SBQQ__LineItems__r where SBQQ__NetTotal__c = null LIMIT 1) FROM sbqq__quote__c WHERE SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.IsClosed = false and Shipping_Address_NEW__c <> NULL and SBQQ__Uncalculated__c = false and SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Probability < 99 AND LastModifiedDate >= YESTERDAY AND SkipVertex__c = false AND (SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.type='Remorse Refund' OR SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.type='Revenue Opportunity' OR SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.type='Parent Opportunity') AND Tax_Calculation_Status__c <> 'Updated' AND Tax_Calculation_Status__c <> 'Aborted' AND (LastModifiedById <>'0051P000003IOLsQAO' OR (LastModifiedById = '0051P000003IOLsQAO' AND SBQQ__SalesRep__c='0054p000003DlTbAAK' AND SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.LastModifiedById <>'0051P000003IOLsQAO'))
